item.title: Stumbling towards a drawing practice
item.description: I’ve been aware for some time that improving my drawing skills would probably have a big impact on all parts of my artistic practice.

item.title: Some thoughts on Mastery
item.description: A few years ago I decided to take a writing class at City College of San Francisco.
